== RESET-MATRIX== 

Resets the current transformation matrix to its default values.

{| cellspacing="1" cellpadding="4" border="0" style="background: black; color: black"
! bgcolor="silver" | Arg 
! bgcolor="silver" | Type 
! bgcolor="silver" | Description
! bgcolor="silver" | Values
|- 
| bgcolor="white" | 
| bgcolor="white" | []
| bgcolor="white" | 
| bgcolor="white" | 
|}
<br>'''Notes and Examples'''
<p>The default transformation matrix is a unit matrix. That is:</p>
<p>|1 0 0|<br>
|0 1 0|<br>
|0 0 1|</p>
<p>If you make changes with '''scale''', '''skew''', or '''rotate''', this is how you would reset them.</p>
